▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

Instruction: Describe the target grid.
Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target grid. Omit any other text.

Expression: The target grid has more X-marked cells than either of the distractor grids, indicating a higher degree of filling in its structure. It features five rows and columns of alternating empty and filled spaces, with the latter being marked by an 'X'. This pattern creates a sense of balance and order within the grid, making it distinct from the other two grids which have either more empty or more filled areas.
